org.apache.distributedlog

Interface Entry.Writer

  • Enclosing class:
    Entry

    public static interface Entry.Writer
    Writer to append LogRecords to Entry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void abortTransmit(Throwable reason)
      Abort the transmit.

    • Method Detail

      • writeRecord

        void writeRecord(LogRecord record,
                 CompletableFuture<DLSN> transmitPromise)
          throws LogRecordTooLongException,
                 WriteException
        Write a LogRecord to this record set.
        Parameters:
        record - record to write
        transmitPromise - callback for transmit result. the promise is only satisfied when this record set is transmitted.
        Throws:
        LogRecordTooLongException - if the record is too long
        WriteException - when encountered exception writing the record

      • hasUserRecords

        boolean hasUserRecords()
        Return if this record set contains user records.
        Returns:
        true if this record set contains user records, otherwise return false.

      • getNumRecords

        int getNumRecords()
        Return number of records in current record set.
        Returns:
        number of records in current record set.

      • getNumBytes

        int getNumBytes()
        Return number of bytes in current record set.
        Returns:
        number of bytes in current record set.

      • getMaxTxId

        long getMaxTxId()
        Return max tx id in current record set.
        Returns:
        max tx id.

      • getBuffer

        io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf getBuffer()
                           throws InvalidEnvelopedEntryException,
                                  IOException
        Get the buffer to transmit.

        The caller is responsible for releasing the reference of the returned bytebuf object.

        Returns:
        the buffer to transmit.
        Throws:
        InvalidEnvelopedEntryException - if the record set buffer is invalid
        IOException - when encountered IOException during serialization

      • finalizeTransmit

        DLSN finalizeTransmit(long lssn,
                      long entryId)
        Finalize the transmit result and result the last DLSN in this transmit.
        Parameters:
        lssn - log segment sequence number
        entryId - entry id
        Returns:
        last dlsn in this transmit

      • completeTransmit

        void completeTransmit(long lssn,
                      long entryId)
        Complete the whole transmit.
        Parameters:
        lssn - log segment sequence number
        entryId - entry id

      • abortTransmit

        void abortTransmit(Throwable reason)
        Abort the transmit.
        Parameters:
        reason - reason to abort transmit
